title: ALT-HERO: the Kickstarter cometh
author: VD
content_html: Some of you may recall Dynamique. In ALT-HERO Book Two, we learn that the Global Justice Initiative utilizes some rather unusual recruitment practices. We are currently in the process of preparing for the Kickstarter, which will launch in approximately 4-6 weeks. The plan is to produce four digital books, which will be collected in a single hardcover book.
